component.name: QWhiteSurGtkDecorations
component.summary: Qt decoration plugin implementing WhiteSur-gtk-like client-side decorations

description.p: Qt decoration plugin implementing WhiteSur-gtk-like client-side decorations
Implemented WhiteSur-gtk-theme style client-side decorations for Qt applications

ul.li: Replace window title buttons with WhiteSur-gtk-theme style icons
Rename project and files to avoid naming conflicts
